description:
Our beautiful studio apartment with outdoor patio extension is unit is fully furnished with a full sized bed and a sofa bed, table, chairs, cableTV, wifi and has a full kitchen with fridge, stove and microwave.

It's completely renovated throughout, and has beautiful flood lighting and exposed brick! The entire unit is yours during your stay. It's a fully furnished apartment that can hold up to 4 people.

The unit has high ceilings, a completed renovation throughout, beautiful flood lighting and exposed brick!

Best part, total seclusion. You share with no one! The entire unit is yours during your stay.

CableTV, Wifi,

My assistant may check you in, or you can use the lockbox. She is available via phone. Otherwise you will be alone for your stay.

The neighborhood of central Harlem is very diverse and full of culture! We are a few blocks from Historic 125th Street, The Apollo Theatre, The Schomburg museum, Sylvia's Restaurant, and many other attractions!

The 2,3 trains are a few blocks away for an easy commute anywhere in the city! 15 minutes to midtown!!!! 

The ABCD on St. Nicholas Ave and  4,5,6 trains on Lexington Ave are about 6 minutes  by walking

This is a prime location for transit! Everything is right there!!!!
name: The Tavern
review: This was a great spot to hang out while on a two week internship in Manhattan. Great price, close to transit, cozy amenities and nice surroundings. This was my 2nd trip to NYC and by far a great place to stay. Thanks for your hospitality!
